name: Hot (Stylized Sun)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="hotSunGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,150,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="sunRayGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,0);stop-opacity:0.8" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,0);stop-opacity:0.5" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="120" fill="url(#hotSunGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 50 L 286 180 L 226 180 Z" fill="url(#sunRayGrad)" />
  <path d="M 462 256 L 332 286 L 332 226 Z" fill="url(#sunRayGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Cold (Stylized Iceberg)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="iceGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="iceShine" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <polygon points="100,450 412,450 350,200 162,200 Z" fill="url(#iceGrad)" stroke="#5C7C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <polygon points="350,200 400,250 350,450 162,450 162,200 Z" fill="url(#iceShine)" opacity="0.6" />
</svg>

name: Day (Bright Sky)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="dayGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="cloudGrad" cx="60%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="60%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,220);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="150" cy="150" r="80" fill="url(#dayGrad)" />
  <path d="M 200 300 C 150 300, 150 200, 250 200 C 350 150, 450 150, 450 250 C 450 350, 350 350, 350 300 C 300 350, 200 350, 200 300 Z" fill="url(#cloudGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Night (Dark Sky)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="nightMoonGrad" cx="60%" cy="40%" r="70%" fx="60%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 256 A 150 150 0 1 0 350 256 A 120 120 0 1 1 150 256 Z" fill="url(#nightMoonGrad)" />
  <polygon points="400,100 410,120 430,120 415,135 420,155 400,140 380,155 385,135 370,120 390,120" fill="#FFD700" />
  <circle cx="100" cy="400" r="10" fill="#FFFFFF" />
</svg>

name: Happy Face
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="happyGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="150" fill="url(#happyGrad)" stroke="#9C9C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="220" r="15" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="220" r="15" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 200 320 Q 256 380, 312 320" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Sad Face
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="sadGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="150" fill="url(#sadGrad)" stroke="#9C7C5C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="220" r="15" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="220" r="15" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 200 350 Q 256 300, 312 350" stroke="#0000FF" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Wet Splash
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="splashGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 256 100 C 350 150, 400 256, 350 350 C 300 400, 200 400, 150 350 C 100 256, 150 150, 256 100 Z" fill="url(#splashGrad)" stroke="#5C7C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="10" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.8" />
</svg>

name: Dry Sand Pile
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="sandGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,220,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,170,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 450 Q 256 300, 412 450 Z" fill="url(#sandGrad)" stroke="#9C9C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 150 400 Q 256 350, 362 400 Z" fill="#FFD700" opacity="0.6" />
</svg>

name: Clean Sparkle
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="sparkleGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,255);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <polygon points="256,100 300,200 400,256 300,312 256,412 212,312 112,256 212,200" fill="url(#sparkleGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="20" fill="#FFD700" />
</svg>

name: Dirty Mud Stain
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="mudGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,70,40);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,30,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 256 C 150 150, 350 150, 412 256 C 350 350, 150 350, 100 256 Z" fill="url(#mudGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="200" r="30" fill="url(#mudGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="300" r="20" fill="url(#mudGrad)" />
</svg>
